title: How can i change email if i forgot?
body: how can i change the email when i have forgotton the email

replies.body:
Try sending them a message [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll probably ask you for a whole bunch of information on your account, like;

1. What ware the 3 first champions you purchased.
2. What IP address did you create this account from.
3. Exact time of your last log-in.

So you might want to get that stuff ready. Although most likely they wont be able to do anything. It's probably best to try and recover your e-mail account.

Maybe write a support ticket, could be the only way if you've forgotton your email.

You might have to provide evidence such as maybe the first four digits of your card you've used to buy rp or something like that even a drivers license I'm not sure what they'd ask for I'm just going off previous games I've had to do this on.
You can't because then it would be easy to hack into someone's account. Which is why they tell you to use an email you use alot/will remember
